nodes.title: Browse products
nodes.desc: Explore various categories and products to find what you need. [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com)

nodes.title: Search products
nodes.desc: Use keywords to find specific products and filter results by price, brand, and more. [Google Shopping](https://www.google.com/shopping)

nodes.title: Review order
nodes.desc: Verify your order details before completing the purchase. [Order Summary](https://www.amazon.com/gp/cart/checkout.html)

nodes.title: Complete purchase
nodes.desc: Finalize your order and receive a confirmation email. [Order Confirmation](https://www.amazon.com/gp/cart/checkout.html)

nodes.title: Track order
nodes.desc: Monitor the status of your order and receive updates on shipping. [Order Tracking](https://www.amazon.com/gp/your-account/order-history.html)

nodes.title: Return item
nodes.desc: Initiate a return or exchange for an item that doesn't fit or meet your expectations. [Return Policy](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201910380)

nodes.title: Contact customer service
nodes.desc: Reach out to customer support for assistance with orders or products. [Customer Service](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/contact-us.html)

nodes.title: Read reviews
nodes.desc: Check out reviews from other customers to help inform your purchasing decisions. [Reviews](https://www.amazon.com/reviews)

nodes.title: Compare products
nodes.desc: Evaluate similar products side-by-side to choose the best option. [Comparison Tool](https://www.amazon.com/gp/compare-products.html)

nodes.title: Use coupons
nodes.desc: Apply promo codes or coupons to receive discounts on your purchase. [Coupons](https://www.amazon.com/gp/coupons)

nodes.title: Earn rewards
nodes.desc: Collect points or rewards for purchases and redeem them for future discounts. [Rewards Program](https://www.amazon.com/gp/rewards)

nodes.title: Share products
nodes.desc: Share products with friends or family via social media or email. [Share](https://www.amazon.com/gp/share)

nodes.title: Create account
nodes.desc: Sign up for an account to save your information and track your orders. [Amazon Sign Up](https://www.amazon.com/ap/register)

nodes.title: Create wishlist
nodes.desc: Add products to a wishlist for future reference or to share with others. [Wishlist](https://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/wishlist.html)

nodes.title: Login
nodes.desc: Access your account to view your order history and saved items. [Amazon Login](https://www.amazon.com/ap/signin)

nodes.title: View product details
nodes.desc: Read product descriptions, reviews, and specifications to make informed purchasing decisions. [Product Page](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B076MX7V2R)

nodes.title: Add to cart
nodes.desc: Select products to purchase and add them to your shopping cart. [Cart](https://www.amazon.com/gp/cart/view.html)

nodes.title: View cart
nodes.desc: Review the items in your cart and make changes before checkout. [Cart](https://www.amazon.com/gp/cart/view.html)

nodes.title: Checkout
nodes.desc: Enter your shipping and payment information to complete your purchase. [Checkout](https://www.amazon.com/gp/cart/checkout.html)

nodes.title: Select shipping
nodes.desc: Choose your shipping options and estimated delivery time. [Shipping Options](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201910350)

nodes.title: Select payment
nodes.desc: Choose your payment method, such as credit card or PayPal. [Payment Options](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201910360)
